You'll lead a talented team of data engineers, BI specialists, and data scientists, building analytics solutions that deliver measurable business results in a fast-paced, collaborative, and vibrant environment.Tasks:Own and optimize the end-to-end Digital Analytics infrastructureâ€”from data collection and processing to insights generation, activation, and ensuring data quality through advanced tracking and tag managementLead the migration and management of analytics tools, including A/B testing, targeting, and audience building from Adobâ€‹â€‹e Suite to the Google Marketing Platform ecosystemDrive strategic decision-making with actionable analytics, contributing key insights to weekly and monthly business trading meetingsDevelop and enhance the Customer Data Platform (CDP),
